title: Civil Aviation Authority (Panama)
text:
The Civil Aviation Authority (Spanish: Autoridad Aeronáutica Civil) is the <a href="civil%20aviation%20authority">civil aviation authority</a> of <a href="Government%20of%20Panama">Panama</a>. Its headquarters are in Building 805 of the former <a href="Albrook%20Air%20Force%20Station">Albrook Air Force Station</a>. Decree No. 147of August 23, 1932 established the agency. Since July 2014, its Director General has been Alfredo Fonseca Mora.
The "Junta de Investigación de Accidentes" investigates <a href="aviation%20accidents%20and%20incidents">aviation accidents and incidents</a>.
